response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This extraordinary item is not just a product; it's an investment in excellence and quality. Given its immense value to you, I am offering it at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a significant saving compared to its market value. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this exceptional opportunity. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 950000}
